155321.title: Kingdom hearts

choices: Follow Riku time on the island
1553211.content:
Riku was falling, he was surround by darkness. Then he landed on something, as he stood up and looked around. He saw mostly darkness and the only light he saw was coming from tht floor. It was a beautiful green and yellow strain glass potrait of a woman and seven dwarfs.

Then suddenly three pedestals appeared and then a sword, a staff and a shield appeared on them.

" Pick your primary and secondary power and the power you must sacrifice." Said a female voice.

Riku was confuse, but thinking this was all a dream he shrugged. He looked at all three pedestals and reed the word them on them.

A sword of unyielding courage, a staff of limitless knowledge, a shield of unbreakable will.

Riku thought about what the voice said. He had to pick two powers and sacrifice the third. Right away he picked the sword, his courage was his favorite trait about him.

Now what should his secondary power be and what should he sacrifice. Knowledge or will thought to him self, both where important. Then he remember being told, knowledge and wisdom will always serve him.

He had courage, so will will help him that much. No, he thought so he picked the staff. With both the sword and staff in hand, the voice said was these the powers he wanted.

Riku shouted yes, then the shield shattered and the pedestals vanished. A staircase of light appeared.

The voice said to go on, but prepare for a fight.

Riku ready himself as he made his way up the stairs. He soon reach another strain glass platform, this time it was purple and blue. Showing a women dancing, as Riku made his to the center.

Suddenly black shadow like monsters started appearing. Riku got into a fighting stance, the shadow like creatures charged at him.

The fight was short, as this monster where weak and unfocused.

" Be ready for the many trials to come, but never what's must important to you." Said the female voice, then suddenly Riku was teleported to a beach.

He looked up and saw a giant sphere of darkness and suddenly a powerful storm started.

Riku ready himself, as a giant shadow monster appeared. This fight was harder but soon Riku defeated it.

Then he was swallow by the darkness.

Riku woke up on the beach, he was sweating.

What happen next ?
1553211.title: Riku's Dream

15532112.content:
Riku was sitting in bed, staring at the ceiling. He was thinking about earlier today, after waking up from that dream. He helped Kairi with building the raft and gather supplies for their trip.

Then he got into a fight with Sora, he sighed. Sora and he use to be good friends, but lately they been growing apart. After beating at a race, Riku went into a cave. He found an old drawing that both Kairi and he did when they where younger. Then a stranger in a black robe appeared and told him the island will soon be devoured.

Sora haven't really mature yet, he always challenging him to anything. Riku knew why, both had feeling for Kairi.

As he was lost in thought, Riku looked out his window. What he saw shocked him, a big and powerful storm was surrounding the island where the three of them kept the raft.

He knew had to get there, so Riku hopped out the window and went to the island.

As he reach the island, Riku knew this storm wasn't normal. He had to fine both Kairi and Sora.

When he stepped on the island, Riku looked up and saw some kind of strange vortex in the sky. He had to find his friends and fast, then suddenly those shadow creatures appeared.

Riku was unarmed but he dodged them and soon found Sora.

" Sora we have to fine Kairi !!" Shouted Riku, Sora just started laughing.

" Don't worry Riku, we're finally going to leave this island together. The darkness will lead the way." Said Sora, with a grin.

Riku was confuse, what was Sora talking about. Riku was about to get closer to Sora, when suddenly he was consumed by a dark vortex beneath him.

Riku was horrified, he had to find Kairi before something like that happen to her. He was about to leave, when he was surrounded by a large group of those shadow monsters.

They all attacked him at once, Riku thought he was dead. Then suddenly a giant key appeared in one of his hands.

It was the size of a sword, he used this keysword to destroyed all of those shadow creatures.

Once done, Riku ran off to search for Kairi. Riku had to fight wave after wave of this shadow creatures. Then he went into the cave, hoping to fine Kairi.

He saw Kairi, but she didn't look good. He ran to her, but Kairi only said his name. Then she vanished in a black wind, Riku was stunned.

He screamed no, as he fell to his knees. He strated to cry, when suddenly he was teleport to an area like the one he has to fight that giant shadow monster.

Riku was puzzled, but then he saw the same shadow monster appeared. Riku was angry and took his frustration out on the monster.

Once defeat, Riku was exhausted as he was consumed by the darkness. He last thoughts where of Kairi, before he lost consciousness.

Riku slowly opened his eyes, he head a powerful headache. He slowly stood up, it took a few moments for him to get his senses back.

He looked around, he was no longer in the island, but in a some strange town. It was dark, and he saw no one. He called out but no one answered.

He prayer both Sora and Kairi where safe, if not here.

What happen next ?

Option 1: A female Final Fantasy character fines Riku. ( R.C. on who)

Option 2: Riku decided to explore this place.
